story.subTitle: Historic City Center
story.overview: Marienplatz is the central square in the heart of Munich's Altstadt (Old Town).

highlights.title: Gothic Architecture
highlights.text: Home to the New Town Hall with its famous Glockenspiel.

highlights.title: Historic Significance
highlights.text: Dating back to 1158, it's been the city's main square for centuries.

facts.text: The square was named after the Mariensäule (Mary's Column) erected in 1638.

story.subTitle: Summer Residence of Bavarian Kings
story.overview: Nymphenburg Palace is one of the largest royal palaces in Europe.

highlights.title: Baroque Architecture
highlights.text: Built in the 17th century, it showcases magnificent baroque design.

highlights.title: Beautiful Gardens
highlights.text: Surrounded by extensive gardens and parklands.

facts.text: Construction began in 1664 by Elector Ferdinand Maria.

story.subTitle: BMW's Heritage and Innovation
story.overview: The BMW Museum showcases the company's history and automotive innovations.

highlights.title: Historic Collection
highlights.text: Features classic BMW models and concept cars.

highlights.title: Interactive Exhibits
highlights.text: Modern displays showcasing BMW's engineering achievements.

facts.text: Opened in 1973, the museum building is shaped like a car cylinder head.

story.subTitle: St. Peter's Church Tower
story.overview: Alter Peter is Munich's oldest parish church, offering panoramic city views.

highlights.title: Historic Church
highlights.text: First mentioned in 1225, it's the city's oldest church.

highlights.title: Panoramic Views
highlights.text: Climb the tower for breathtaking views of Munich.

facts.text: The church was first mentioned in documents from 1225.

story.subTitle: Specialty Coffee in Munich
story.overview: Kanso Coffee offers high-quality, carefully sourced coffee beans and expert brewing.

highlights.title: Quality Beans
highlights.text: Sourced from sustainable farms around the world.

highlights.title: Expert Brewing
highlights.text: Baristas trained in various brewing methods.

facts.text: Founded in 2018, Kanso focuses on single-origin coffee beans.

story.subTitle: Historic Beer Hall
story.overview: Hofbräuhaus is one of Munich's most famous beer halls, serving traditional Bavarian cuisine.

highlights.title: Historic Setting
highlights.text: Founded in 1589, it's one of Munich's oldest beer halls.

highlights.title: Traditional Cuisine
highlights.text: Authentic Bavarian dishes and world-famous beer.

facts.text: Founded in 1589 by Wilhelm V, Duke of Bavaria.
